ref.mixed-citation: Saint-Arnaud M, Asselin H, Dubé C, Croteau Y, Papatie C: Developing criteria and indicators for aboriginal forestry : mutual learning through collaborative research. Edmonton: CCI Press and Sustainable Forest Management Network; 2009: 85–105.
